Posts.Title: I am done angie27 Maire67

Posts.Content: Jul 8, 2009 09:47AM njdarcy wrote: Thanks to all of your stories.  It has given me such hope and strength during my first few days after diagnosis.(I was diagnosed on July 6th with DCIS and IDC)  I have to go see my breast surgeon tomorrow to go over the pathology report and everybody tells me to write down any questions I have.  Can anybody give me suggestions on what questions I should ask?  I am pretty much in a fog right now.   Again, thank you for sharing your success stories.  This is an awesome site!
Posts.Title: I am done angie27 Maire67

Posts.Content: Jul 7, 2009 02:44PM njdarcy wrote: I was just diagnosed yesterday with DCIS with invasive cells.  I have not seen the doctor yet to get a full explanation but in the meantime I am so scared! I can't concentrate or think about anything else.  I am at work but I can't stop crying! I was told to go to this site by a friend who had a double mastectomy. I guess I just want to talk to people who have been through this. Thanks for listening! njdarcy
